original_text: the master of that servant will come on a day when he does not expect him and at an hour he does not know, and will cut him in pieces and put him with the unfaithful.
korean_text: 생각하지 않은 날 알지 못하는 시각에 그 종의 주인이 이르러 엄히 때리고 신실하지 아니한 자의 받는 벌에 처하리니

sentences.original_text: the master of that servant will come
on a day when he does not expect him
and at an hour he does not know
and will cut him in pieces
and put him with the unfaithful.
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 신실하지 않은 자들과 함께 둘 것입니다
